mapTimings.name: Delayed Support
mapTimings.description: If players choose to delay pushing Ji'Nara, Hybrid waves will automatically spawn at certain times, regardless of her position on the map. These times are:

mapTimings.name: Attack Waves
mapTimings.description: Attack waves will target a random player (or the player playing on a harder difficulty) and attack them first from their side. Then, the players will alternate in getting attacked until double waves start spawning. Note: Every Hybrid spawn will delay future attack waves by 2 minutes.

mapTimings.name: Escort Waves
mapTimings.description: The Escort Wave Timings for this mission are:

mapTimings.name: Slayn Elementals (Bonus Objective)
mapTimings.description: The timings for the Slayn Elementals are as follows:

mapTimings.name: Attack Waves
mapTimings.description: Note: Attack Waves will only spawn when there is more than 1:30 left on the clock. If there is less time, the attack waves will be delayed until that particular objective is complete. Once complete, the attack wave will spawn. The Attack Wave Timings for this mission are:

mapTimings.name: Attack Waves
mapTimings.description: Attack waves always spawn when there is 1:00 left on the night clock. Additionally, they will always come in transports. The side they come from is randomized. The attack wave Tech Levels and Strength Levels for each night are shown below.

mapTimings.name: Attack Waves
mapTimings.description: Enemy attack waves will target certain Locks first. The first player-captured Lock on their list will be their target. If all the Locks on their list are overloaded (ie. enemy-controlled), they will target your base.

timings.lockTarget: N ⇨ W ⇨ O, E ⇨ S ⇨ O

mapTimings.name: Post 5th Wave
mapTimings.description: After the 5th attack wave, the subsequent attack waves will follow a fixed pattern, starting from the 19-minute mark as shown below. The pattern above will repeat every 2 minutes indefinitely.

mapTimings.name: Suppression Tower Spawns
mapTimings.description: All times are shown as time left on the clock to completion of the terminal.

mapTimings.name: Harass Waves
mapTimings.description: All times are shown as time left on the clock to completion of the terminal. (* and ** are pattern dependent, see SC2COOP page for details.

mapTimings.name: Attack Waves
mapTimings.description: First attack wave always at 3:36, subsequent attack waves occur when the transport is halfway between terminals 2 and 3, and 3 and 4.

mapTimings.name: Attack Waves
mapTimings.description: These are attack waves that target your main and your expansion.

mapTimings.name: Panic Timers
mapTimings.description: If ships are not launched fast enough, a ship will start to panic and force a launch. This forces players to play more aggressively. Launching a ship early will cancel that panic time. This can be useful for avoiding harder ships. The panic times are shown below.

mapTimings.name: Claimer Waves
mapTimings.description: Claimer waves will target ships in an attempt to destroy them. The timings, Strength and Tech Levels of these waves is shown below.

mapTimings.name: Attack Waves
mapTimings.description: These are waves that target your base.

mapTimings.name: Harvester Times
mapTimings.description: These are the times when the harvester bots are sent out, making them vulnerable to attack.

mapTimings.name: Harasser Times
mapTimings.description: These are waves specifically targeting the bots to destroy them.

mapTimings.name: Train Times
mapTimings.description: These are the spawn times of the trains and their locations.

mapTimings.name: Attack Times
mapTimings.description: The spawn timings, direction, Strength and Tech Level of the attack waves is shown below. The directions denote which ramp the attack waves will push. Note that North attack waves will target your expansion.

mapTimings.name: Attack Times
mapTimings.description: The timings for the attack waves, Strength and Tech Levels and targets on this map are shown below.

mapTimings.description: The spawn timings for the Bonus trains is below:

mapTimings.name: Attack  Times
mapTimings.description: Some attack waves in this mission have variance associated with their spawn timings. That is, attack waves have a little bit of randomness as to when they will spawn. The attack wave timings and variances are shown below. A variance of 1:30 seconds means attack waves can spawn anywhere from 1:30 before the attack wave timing to 1:30 after the attack wave timing.

mapTimings.name: Shuttle Timings
mapTimings.description: Shuttle Timings, Headings, Escort Strength and Tech Levels for this mission are shown below. Note that wave #7 will occur in one of three different patterns, all listed in the table.
